Name: Name Change, Jericho Turnpike
Title: A Local Law in relation to renaming a portion of Jamaica Avenue in the Borough of Queens, so that it shall hereafter be known as Jericho Turnpike, and to amending the official map of the city of New York accordingly.

History.Description: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
This Introduction was Amendment Proposed by Comm
This Introduction was Amended by Committee
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
A motion was made that this Introduction be Approved by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
This Introduction was Sent to Mayor by Council
This Introduction was Hearing Held by Mayor
This Introduction was Signed Into Law by Mayor
This Introduction was Recved from Mayor by Council

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1. The following street in the Borough of Queens is hereby renamed as follows:

New Name	Present Name	Limits	
Jericho Turnpike	Jamaica Avenue	between the Cross Island Parkway and 257th Street, along the city line between the city of New York and the county of Nassau	

§2. The official map of the city of New York shall be amended in accordance with the provisions of section one of this local law.
§3. This local law shall take effect ninety days after its enactment into law.
